notesForValidator: Follow-up unification: CLI-level resolve_session_id is now fail-closed for explicit values (explicit always requires an existing session). Migrated remaining session-sensitive CLIs (task claim/ready, session status, qa bundle) to use edison.cli.resolve_session_id so all CLI resolution routes through one helper -> core require/detect. Updated script-level CLI tests to create real session entities (session.json) since session scoping now requires existence.
